item.title: PI Help with whip colors
item.dc:creator: @alipotter123 alipotter123
item.description:
@alipotter123 wrote:

I added the models into client but the colors of the lime and lava only shows as a abby whip colors.
Please help me asap.

case 16018:

        itemDef.actions = new String[5];
        itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
        itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
        itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield";
        itemDef.modelID = 5412;
        itemDef.anInt165 = 5409;
        itemDef.anInt200 = 5409;
        itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
        itemDef.modelRotationY = 280;
        itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
        itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
        itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
        itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
        itemDef.name = "Lava Whip";
        itemDef.description = "A Lava Abyssal Whip".getBytes();
        itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 6073;
        itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528;
    break;


		case 16022:
        itemDef.actions = new String[5];
        itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";
        itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
        itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
        itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528;
        itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 17350;
    itemDef.modelID = 5412;
    itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
   	    itemDef.modelRotationY = 280;
    itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
    itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
    itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
    itemDef.anInt165 = 5409;
    itemDef.anInt200 = 5409;
        itemDef.name = "Lime Whip";
        itemDef.description = "Abyssal Whip Recolored!".getBytes();
	break;

Tried everthing but won’t work…

But the death cape works…
case 13746:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelID = 70001;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 500;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1;
itemDef.anInt165 = 70000;
itemDef.anInt200 = 70000;
itemDef.name = “Death Cape”;
itemDef.description = “The cape worn by masters of PKing.”.getBytes();
break;

Read full topic
